pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

nodes.body:
For reference, here is the mathlib3 version: https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib/blob/65a1391a0106c9204fe45bc73a039f056558cb83/src/tactic/norm_num.lean#L1051-L1107

I didn't actually directly port that logic line-by-line; I found it easier to start from scratch.

:v: dwrensha can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7617745793/job/20747436151)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7617745793/job/20747436407)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7617745793/job/20747436670)

LGTM!

I pushed some small tweaks, feel free to revert them if you don't like them.

bors d+

Perhaps leave it a day or two to see if @digama0 or @thorimur has anything to add.
@dwrensha, I pushed the change I was thinking of here

Unfortunately these can't be generalized to `NNRat` or `NNReal` without something like https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/tree/nnrat-norm_num; while definitely not a job for this PR, it would be great if someone could adopt it!

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: implement zpow norm_num extension
